title: Cy EditorTools Asset Extended Detail
description: Asset extended detail is a tool for the editor that allows to display detailed information about the selected assets in the content browser.
longDescription:
Compatible with 4.25 , 4.26 , 4.27

Compatible with 5.00 , 5.1 , 5.2 , 5.3 ( Not updated for the next version )


WARNING : the current version will no longer be maintained after version 5.3 due to big changes in the engine librarys, many functions are deprecated as well as official plugins.


[ Warning , several warnings are impossible to correct due to depreciation of the engine function, if you have errors linked to the asset action, it is an engine error which does not update the blueprint, you just have to open it and resave it. ]


[WebPage]

[Video Preveiw]

[Documentation]


Asset extended detail is a tool for the editor that allows to display detailed information about the selected assets in the content browser, but it also allows to modify the variables without opening the associated asset editor, but also to visualize the first layer of asset dependency and the MetaTags. 

The "Extended Detail" option allows you to view and modify options that are not normally available in the editor.

During the development of the tool I added the possibility to add plugins to add actions on the selected asset, like for example the possibility to create LODs from rules for a static mesh, to rename assets in groups, or to resize textures.

It is also possible to create your own plugins or action scripts simply, a complete tutorial for creating them is available in the documentation.


This tools include small basic tools:

  • CyE_GlobalLog ( advanced log for tools for CyE )
  • CyE_AboutAsset ( Additional information for asset )
  • CyE_LogInfo ( Quick information about an asset in the "output log" )
  • CyE_PrefixBase ( Simple asset prefix tool via context menu )
  • NEW CyE_ActorExtendedDetail ( Allows to increase the number of visible details for the actors. )
  • NEW Cy_AssetLoader ( allows you to force the loading of project assets for the creation of the DDC )


UPDATE 1.1 :

Cy ExtendedActor has been added to the content, it allows to have more details on the selected actors in the scene, and to see also the hidden components .

Correction of the structure that changed in version 5.1.
technicalDetails:
Base Features:

  •  View and edit Base detail of asset
  •  View and edit Extended detail of asset
  •  View dependencies of asset
  • View Tags of asset
  • Plugin supported ( Can create and add user plugins )

Plugin StaticMesh ( Script ):

  • Create Static Mesh collision
  • Create Lod from rules

Plugin Texture2D ( Script ):

  • Resize Texture
  • Apply material to texture ( multi material pass )

Plugin Rename ( Script ):

  • Replace
  • Prefix
  • Sufix
  • UE format
  • Numerator


Number of Blueprints ( only tools ) : 29

Number of Blueprints ( only additional tools ) : 23

Number of Blueprints ( Library ) : 61

Number of Blueprints ( Total ) : 113


Input: No required

Network Replicated: No ( Editor tools only )

Supported Development Platforms: All

Documentation: https://sites.google.com/view/cyeditortools/cye_tools/cye_assetstools/cye_assetextendeddetail?authuser=0

Important/Additional Notes: Required Unreal engine 4.25 or higher and official plugin ( Free From EpicGame ) :

  • Editor Scripting Utilities
  • Blueprint Material and Texture Nodes
  • Blueprint File Utilities
  • Asset Manager Editor
  • Asset Tags


Tool path : \_Cy_EditorTools\CyE_AssetExtendedDetail\CyE_AssetExtendedDetail

Right click and run Editor Widget utilities
